      • renderOpnodes

        public static void renderOpnodes(SimpleBlockRendering sbr,
                                 java.util.List<int[]> nodes,
                                 int bright,
                                 boolean newTessellation)
        Renders opnodes to SimpleBlockRendering.
        Parameters:
        sbr - The renderer class.
        nodes - The opnode list. Get it from SimpleModelParser
        bright - The brightness of the model
        newTessellation - If we should call SimpleBlockRendering.begin() and SimpleBlockRendering.end()

      • renderOpnode

        public static void renderOpnode(SimpleBlockRendering sbr,
                                int[] opnode,
                                int bright,
                                boolean newTessellation)
        Renders a single opnode to SimpleBlockRendering.
        Parameters:
        sbr - The renderer class.
        opnode - The opnode itself. Get it from SimpleModelParser
        bright - The brightness of the model
        newTessellation - If we should call SimpleBlockRendering.begin() and SimpleBlockRendering.end()
